PPLoc: http://www.victoriassecret.com/privacy-and-security/; http://www.victoriassecret.com/uk-privacy-policy?overlayType=popup (on the email and postal mail sign-up page); and careers.lb.com (UK jobs)
activities: L Brands, Inc.'s (LBI's) brand (Victoria's Secret) operates retail stores in the United Kingdom, as well as victoriassecret.co.uk (a site that shows store locations, enables email and postal mail signup, and facilitates job applications via redirect to careers.lb.com).  To operate these channels, LBI collects data about prospective, current and former (1) employees, (2) contractors, and (3) consumers.  This information is used to evaluate job candidates, employ individuals, serve consumers, facilitate necessary operations, and market to consumers.  Additionally, the UK stores process payments via bank cards.
personaldata: Data about current and former employees, contractors, and consumers related to store and online retail sales, marketing, and operations
recoursemech:
EU data protection authorities (DPAs) for HR data.

DMA Safe Harbor Program for all other data.
